attributes.action: reintroduce into the GCSE curriculum at least one compulsory foreign language
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Learning French or German or Italian or Spanish, or even Mandarin, Urdu or Latin is not simply about acquiring practical skills.  Research proves that it improves the brain's capacity to learn, and even improves one's abilities in one's native tongue.  To allow children to opt out by the age of 14 is irresponsible in the extreme.
